DESCRIPTION: Playing enough Cards with the same Type as this card will finish the Chain and unlock the specified Effect. Chains wear off at the end of turn.
Prevents damage after Block. NL Half of it is dealt to the Player in 2 turns as Relayed Damage. Relayed Damage cannot be blocked by Relay.
Damage that was relayed. Half of it (rounded down) is dealt to the Player at the end of the next turn. Is not blocked by Relay.
When you obtain 3 Momentum, add a Swirl into your hand. Swirls are attacks that double their strength for every other Swirl played in the same turn.
Doubles the damage and Block of Swirls this turn.
Enemies lose HP everytime they gain Block.
